Uses of Package
httpserver

  • Classes in httpserver used by httpserver 
    Class and Description
    AbstractServer
    Base server class
    HttpService
    Interface defining what services HTTP server must implement
    HttpServiceAdapter
    Additional abstraction level for HttpService
    OrdinaryHttpService.Method
    Enumeration for methods
    PropertiesReader
    Reads properties from a property file
    Request
    Class representing client request
    Server
    Interface defining Server classes
